website_summaries.verdict: Extremely inexpensive baseball bag that works great for a young player who doesn't have tons of gear.
pros: Will hold up to two bats comfortably with a well-balanced design that makes the bag easy to carry
Padding in shoulder straps allows you to carry your gear comfortably
One pocket has a ventilation mesh material to air out your cleats and other sweaty gear
Comes with a hook for hanging on the dugout fence for convenience
cons: Smaller than most baseball gear storage bags

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack, my son's uses it for t-ball so idk if would be good for heavier stuff. Also I found it at Walmart way cheaper then in here. Just fyi
customer_reviews.author: cindy parker

customer_reviews.title: Not made well
customer_reviews.text: I used this bag for my son at one practice. The day of his first game I picked it up by the handle and it ripped. I also noticed the backpack strap fraying. I loved this bad and so did he but it's not made well at all. It only lasted us two days of t ball. All we had in it was a t ball bat in each pocket and a glove and helmet in the main pocket. We are returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry eldridge

customer_reviews.title: I actually really love the design of this bag
customer_reviews.text: My son did tee ball this past year and after a couple games of him trying to juggle his helmet, glove, etc, I knew he needed a bag. I actually really love the design of this bag. He can easily wear it on his back and it holds everything he could possibly need. I think the elastic straps for the bats are quite clever. The bag survived the entire season of tee ball and looks like it will hold up for a number of seasons of whatever he might want to play next.
customer_reviews.author: Jherseygirl

customer_reviews.title: Only fits very narrow bats!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10-yr old. It's a constant struggle trying to fit his 2-5/8" 30" bat into the bat holders; it's simply too small! We have to put his bat in the main compartment instead which just gets dirt inside. This might work for very young players with short and narrow bats, but not feasible for players even a bit older. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: calvin

customer_reviews.title: 5 year old tee ball player and it's great! It's big enough to fit his helmet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bag for my 4.5 year old tee ball player and it's great! It's big enough to fit his helmet, hat, mitt, and water bottle in the big section, with some room to spare so he should be able to use this bag for years. I keep small toys for the younger brother to play with and sunscreen in the smaller zip pocket, with extra room to spare. It fits all this without being too big and bulky for my son to carry. We've used it for about 2 months and it doesn't have any wear on it yet
customer_reviews.author: Mollygrimm

customer_reviews.title: Loving this backpack!
customer_reviews.text: The backpack has so much room and appears to be quite durable. We’ve only had it for a short time, but my son loves it. His batting helmet, hat, glove, balls, bat and extras fit easily. A thin water bottle can fit in the second bat pocket. And there are 2 outside pockets for batting gloves, snacks, etc. We’re very happy that we chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: Zachy11

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Tball player
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for his Tball this year. Perfect size for him (and it would be fine for my older daughter as well). He was able to fit his helmet, glove, bat, sweatshirt and a few other small things with a little room left. Probably a little on the small side for kids playing in a more serious league and older age group but it did everything we needed it to. I would say perfect size for 10/12 (or someone with not so much gear or gear on the smaller side)
customer_reviews.author: stacy k

customer_reviews.title: Slightly Better Than OK
customer_reviews.text: The bag is a good size. It fits my little leaguer's batting helmet, glove, 2 bats, a few baseballs, and miscellaneous stuff easily. It also looks nice and has a hook for hanging on the fence. Overall, a really good value. However, the material is thin and the construction is not high quality. I expect the bag to last 2 seasons based on the quality of the materials and construction....which is fine considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: G. Josefsberg

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bag is big enough to fit every baseball gear: helmet, cleats, mitts, mask, water bottle. Bats can be places in the side. Only issue I had is that the top loop to hold the bat does not tighten to secure the handle part. Stretchy but still loose. Still keeps it from swinging around but tightening it could add extra security. Other than that, bag is good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver O.

customer_reviews.title: Good Value!
customer_reviews.text: This baseball bag is the perfect size for my son; it holds the bat and water bottle on the sides, and the main pouch holds his helmet and glove. I'm only giving 4 stars because of a weird design; you need to unzip the bag in order to get to the hook to hang it on the fence. There is also a smaller pouch near the top of bag that seems out of place. But for the price, we are happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather A.

customer_reviews.title: Will buy something better next year
customer_reviews.text: I got this on a deal. Good thing because he will need something sturdier next year. It was plenty big enough for a glove, batting helmet, baseball cap, 30 oz water bottle, 2 bats. There is room left over. I just don't like that the bag isn't thick and sturdy. My 7 year old spent a lot of time struggling to get stuff in and out because the bag always collapsed on him.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca g.

customer_reviews.text: It was good at first, you can pack exactly what you need for a game, but after a month of use certain spots of the bag started to tear, due to the fact that the material is very thing. Zipper is cheap, the strap to hold the bat is extra cheap.
customer_reviews.author: @NELLHeavyMoney

customer_reviews.title: Two weeks of use entire bag is ripped do not buy
customer_reviews.text: This bag is almost ripped all the way around the inside after the first two weeks of owning. I probably have unzipped and used it for my toddler four times. I can be a cheap guy but do not buy this you’ll thank me later. I was thinking well it will get me through the season of t ball. But it got two practices in and two days playing at home and all the seams on the inside are ripped.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany lowe

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to, but is too large to be considered a youth bag, made of thin material
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like most things about this bag. I do wish it was smaller since it is labeled a youth bag but looks more like an adult bag. I also wish it held it's shape better, it's made of pretty thin material so when it is loaded up with baseball equipment it completely loses it's shape.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Simple bag, could use minor improvements, but has held up already
customer_reviews.text: This has helped our young son starting Baseball quite a bit. It honestly has stood up well already from being beat around some. We do wish it had a better place to hold a water bottle on the side (it seems like you could, but is too tight), and I do wish maybe had more pockets to organize a few things. But it has been a great bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This bag has one large compartment and 2 places for bats. It has a hook to hang on the fence and a small pocket in the front for a phone or whatever. It's a great size for my little leaguer, but would be too small for older players. Overall, a great bag for the price. Perfect for new players.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Its a pretty basic bag but for the price its a great ...
customer_reviews.text: Its a pretty basic bag but for the price its a great deal. Got enough pockets to fit the smaller things like snacks while having enough room in the big compartment for helmet and glove. I'd suggest using it only for TBall and a little bit older. Something like a 12 year old might be pushing it.
customer_reviews.author: Tha Scarecro

customer_reviews.title: ok at best
customer_reviews.text: It is really hard to fit the bat into the sleeve, so not a big fan of that. It needs to be bigger (keep in mind I'm talking bout a tee ball bat so forget about a bigger bat). The bag is really flimsy and once you take stuff out it just flops over. Also there is no spot for water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: BP

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Bat Bag for kids
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my 5 year old for his 1st year of Little League. It is exactly what he needed-place to hold the bat, room inside for mitt, helmet, etc. Can also hold his water bottle. The price was right and he loves it. I am sure it would be fine for older kids also. He especially likes the hook so he can hang it like the other boys.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Ross

customer_reviews.title: This bag easily holds all of his gear without having to fit ...
customer_reviews.text: After reading tons of reviews we decided on this gear bag for my son. This is his first year in Little League so I wasn't sure what we were going to need. This bag easily holds all of his gear without having to fit everything in like a puzzle just to get it to close. He carries his helmet, mitt, bat, cleats and a few balls with no issue. Also, it seems to be made of quality material. Worth a little extra money for the quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our lil, big guy. Seriously recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter & Son in Law bought for their 6, just turned 7 year old Son, during his lil league season. Is of great quality, looks great, fit all equipment & still had room for bottled water, sports drink, snacks & whatnots. Very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Cher

customer_reviews.title: Best bag!
customer_reviews.text: All around great bag! It was my daughter's 1st year playing T-Ball...I wasn't wanting to spend a lot of money on all the necessities, in case she decided she didn't want to play after this year. I was a little nervous I was going to be getting something that wasn't great quality, with such a great price, but I was wrong! I think we can get many years of use with this bag! Plenty of room for bat, glove, balls, and helmet! Durable material!
customer_reviews.author: MOM

customer_reviews.title: Great t-ball backpack
customer_reviews.text: I'm able to fit one baseball helmet, a glove, bat, throwdown bases, pair of shoes, full uniform, and I still have plenty of room for other items. This also has a separate pouch for baseballs. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Everything fits Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I brought this item for my 4 year old in Tball. His helmet with face guard, glove, two balls,and cleats fit in the top part. The bat fits good on the side and there is extra slot where I will put his change of clothes in. So far so good. *** Update*** the strap broke with 2 weeks. I just missed the return day as of yesterday. I hoping I can fix it . Im changing to 3 stars
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Advice reader

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: we got this to use for tball stuff for our twins. it made it all season without fail. loved this bag will definitely buy another one next season so we have 2. perfect size for the 2 gloves 2 bats 2 hats 2 water bottles, snacks and batting helmet. we loved this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Slademomma

customer_reviews.title: Great bag. I bought this for my son's first ...
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. I bought this for my son's first season and now that we've had some experience at the ball diamonds I wish there was an external place for his helmet. Storing it inside the bag just gets annoying when my son is grabbing things.
customer_reviews.author: laurenrenee

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but cheaply made...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is okay for about one season for a YOUNG player who uses it very lightly. However, the zippers are cheaply made and hardly work, which is the real reason for my review. I don't want others to be as disappointed in the quality as I was. I wouldn't recommend for a player who is serious about the game. The one positive is it is a really cute bag. Not sure it was worth the money, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works for what we need it for.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this for our preteen daughter for traveling softball. It works great, just seems a little chintzy. I do wonder how long it will last, but it did make it through one season so far. She doesn't have her own helmet, so we don't have to worry about fitting that in there either.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Love the smaller design and durability
customer_reviews.text: This has been the perfect bag for my sons table gear. It’s not too bulky where he can actually carry it on his back and has held up well with a four year old being rough and tough with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Minor

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag
customer_reviews.text: Fits his helmet, jersey and glove in the main compartment. Batting gloves in the front zipper. Water bottle on the side, bat on the other side. Still room for more. Also, there is a hanger type hook that comes out of the top zipper if you want to hang it on the fence so it isn't on the ground, its great.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for a small price
customer_reviews.text: My sons needed bags to hold your baseball gear for Little League. This bag definitely fit the bill. Inexpensive and looks pretty durable so far. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. R. Bellamy

customer_reviews.title: Great for t-ball, can’t beat the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son’s t-ball season. Easily holds his helmet, glove, cleats, and bat. The hook to hang it on the fence is a nice feature. It should last a few years with light use.
customer_reviews.author: Craig A Syphrit

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last very long
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son (who was 5 at the time) last fall for tee ball. It barely lasted through his Spring season before the zippers stopped working. My son is pretty rough on his stuff, but I expected this to last a lot longer than six months. If you're getting this for a younger player, I would avoid it and find something else that's more durable.
customer_reviews.author: C-

customer_reviews.title: Frankly
customer_reviews.text: Great. This is my first time having to buy a product like this, but for the sports my son plays, it’s top of the line as far as I’m concerned. Softball 3 days a week traveling with bat, batting helmet, mitt, glove, cleats & water/gatorade bottles; this is the smartest & best $20 I’ve ever spent!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany N. Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value!
customer_reviews.text: This is exact what my 6 year old son needed for baseball. It holds two bats and is very large for carrying all his gear. It’s very well made and as rough as he is on things, I think he will be able to have it for years to come. Awesome buy! HIGHLY Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Ricken

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for your money. I was afraid it wouldn’t fit all my sons gear but thankfully everything fit perfectly. His helmet 2 bats his shoes extra clothes water bottles and other miscellaneous stuff. I don’t regret it and the best part is that he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Easy to carry, stitching could be improved.
customer_reviews.text: Easy for my children to carry themselves. Holds all of our tee ball gear inside and is very roomy. Used it for a month and some of the stitching came undone around the bat holder and now will only hold one bat.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: BEST BAG FOR LITTLE LEAGUERS
customer_reviews.text: Omg never get a bat bag for your little leaguer anywhere else! This EXACT SAME BAG was at Goetz Bros in the bay area for $80. No freakin way. SO HAPPY
customer_reviews.author: Melzie Condara Tublet

customer_reviews.title: Perfect baseball backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Such a great tball/baseball backpack for my 5 year old! Would be perfect for up to 8-10 year olds as well. Can hold a bat on each side, holds his cleats, helmet, water bottle, & glove in side! Great quality & price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely holds a helmet, water bottles, gloves, balls and much more!
customer_reviews.text: Would definitely recommend this to anyone who has a child playing baseball for more than 1 year. Tons of room with a couple of other handy compartments as well!
customer_reviews.author: Jason C.

customer_reviews.title: Great bat bag for my 3,6,&7 y.o!
customer_reviews.text: My little league kids love this bag! They love being able to carry all of their items to their games. And I love not being the one to do it! Lol it has held up so far for almost a month and still looks like new. I love the hook on the top as well. This is an update one year later! We actually bought another bat pack this year now that we have a teeball played! The older bag is still is amazing shape and holds everything! The new bag is perfect as expected!
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: Torn
customer_reviews.text: The mesh on the front is already torn and it hasn’t been used that much. There’s probably a better product on the market. I wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Linds

customer_reviews.title: Does the job...just enough
customer_reviews.text: Quality is a bit flimsy. Openings aren't crisp. Not the sturdiest bag either. But for the price, you get great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: NickA

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 7 year old, it’s the perfect size for everything he needs to play ball this year and it seems like it will be for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the product!
customer_reviews.text: Great, durable bag for the money. My sons first year of baseball and this fit all his gear and hung easy on the fence.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Son
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying to make sure I write more amazon reviews because I find them so helpful. This is a great baseball backpack and a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for tball. Only downfall is the baseball bat pockets at the bottom are too small. Not durable enough to hold the baseball bat but for tball it worked out.
customer_reviews.author: Esha

customer_reviews.title: Very roomy
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase because from the photos it looked pretty slim. To my surprise this bag is extra roomy can can fit a helmet, glove, cleats and hat all in the large zipper alone. I use the small pocket for my sons batting gloves, and the middle pocket for sunglasses and cup. Fits everything! I bought two and I am not disappointed. Great value for your buck!
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Williams

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: It has held up for the 2019 and 2020 Tee ball season well. Worth the money for a younger player with light gear.
customer_reviews.author: BN

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Larger than I expected, I was wanting something smaller but my fault for not looking at the measurements closer. It’s kinda big for my 4 year old but it fits everything and is a perfect bat bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality but cheap price
customer_reviews.text: It is OK for a kid to hold baseball stuff. The price of the bag is low. Now it is even lower( from $17 drop to $12). However, the quality of this bag is OK.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bag - Great price!
customer_reviews.text: For under $15 and how it carries all paraphernalia, it's a GREAT value. Son loves it! HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
customer_reviews.author: NYCmom

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this for softball and it holds her helmet, mask, water bottle, glove and 2 bats with room to spare, also holds the bats where they are supposed to be, would repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Yocum

customer_reviews.title: Great storage
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great for extra room! The only down side is, it doesn’t hold batts well. The bats fling all over when in bag.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: My little Slugger loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my nephew and he loves it. It made him feel more included in his team. My sister also loves it because it has a vent in the top for anything dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great first youth baseball bat bag and priced right
customer_reviews.text: This bag is loved by my son. Baseball bat webbing on sides of bag are a little inadequate for 2 5/8" bat (only issue).
customer_reviews.author: CSA

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Great value and my son loves it for his season. Holds bat nicely and plenty of room inside for his glove and helmet 😊
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: after 1 day
customer_reviews.text: High rated bag. Low price. We have only had it 1 day grandson loved it. seems very sturdy and well made. If something changes my opinion I will rereview
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: So far love everything about it
customer_reviews.text: I really like this bag. Love the hook inside that you can hang the bag up at games. Wish there was a spot for a water bottle. But overall has been a good bag so far
customer_reviews.author: Felica Neer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Seems pretty good loaded it up with equipment we’ll see how long it lasts , but can’t be the price
customer_reviews.author: Dave kunz

customer_reviews.title: Just What We Expected/Needed!
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this bag. It has been great for our son to use at his tee ball games. Very sturdy and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: KEC

customer_reviews.title: Badass!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Bought this for my son.. My cheap ass always looks for the deal first and when i ran across this bag, i knew it was not only a deal but a steal! Like its inexpensive, plenty of room, good quality, and rare... I've only seen 1 other kid with a "mlb baseball bag" similar to this one.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi

customer_reviews.title: Cost is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Great item for the price. Team members moms always ask where we got this, over 1/2 the price of what they paid for Their bags.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Sufficient for a 10-year old
customer_reviews.text: Nothing special but my grandson loves having it (everyone else had one... he needed one too!)
customer_reviews.author: Al B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: It's a really nice bag with good quality stitching. The fence hook is a plus, although some come with two hooks to help support the weight better. It also hasn't gotten too dirty despite being tossed around the dugout 4xs a week.
customer_reviews.author: Qiana

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Great value for the money! My 7 year old loves it. It was larger than expected also
customer_reviews.author: C. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was a little bigger but it still works. Quality seems fine. My son uses it for baseball and it fits his helmet, glove and two bats. We'll see how many seasons it last.
customer_reviews.author: Cloggedart

customer_reviews.title: Great all purpose bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag with plenty of room for gear. Wish the material was just a little thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for price
customer_reviews.text: Really nice bag for what I paid. Nice mesh on the top. I wasn’t expecting it to be as nice as it is.
customer_reviews.author: kristen obrien

customer_reviews.title: We like it so far!
customer_reviews.text: We needed to upgrade our baseball bag after using the same one for several years. This seems to be holding up well so far.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for little baseball players. Perfect to keep all your stuff in one place!
customer_reviews.author: mccbe

customer_reviews.title: Great brand for an great price!
customer_reviews.text: Came as as expected and looked great. It’s a Christmas present for my son who won’t be back in baseball til fall but I jumped on the short sale that was like $10 off and that just sold me but it looks really good and great quality I think he’ll love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great size backpack and looks great
customer_reviews.text: Great size backpack and looks great. However, inside beginning to tear already from hanging the bag on the fence.
customer_reviews.author: Jabari M. Jones

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bag for all your baseball needs
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag for all your baseball needs. It has a place to hold 2 bats, your helmet, balls, glove, etc. My grandson loves it. It also has a hook to put on the fence to hang.
customer_reviews.author: Richard & Karen McPhail

customer_reviews.title: NOT A YOUTH SIZE!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag for my 4 year old. This is NOT youth size. This bag is a FULL BACKPACK for an adult. I now have to carry all of his teeball items in his bag because it’s way too big.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany L.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect size for my 7 year old. It holds everything he needs. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift, great quality, price, and functionality. My son loves it.
customer_reviews.author: aronc88

customer_reviews.title: Nice bat bag
customer_reviews.text: Son's first year little league, this bag is nice, holds two bats, helmet, glove and more. Adjustable and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn E. Rudie

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome bat bag
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome bat bag. Makes it so much easier to get to and from practice and games. Great quality for the price. Plenty of room for 4 gloves 5 balls and 2 bats! Comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BAG!
customer_reviews.text: Got this bag for my 11 yr old son...he loves it! Took it to every practice and game this past rec season, and it still looks good as new. Zippers are sturdy and the extra small pockets were great for sunglasses and gum. He really liked the hook to hang it on the fences, kept it cleaner and handy when switching out gear between innings.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa D

customer_reviews.title: Great for new players
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for new baseball players. Fits 5 year old perfect and all his gear.
customer_reviews.author: NDK221

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for a fantastic bag
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack. Has a hook so my son can hang it on the chain link in the dug out. Place for two bats, and plenty of room in the backpack for a batting helmet, glove, balls even snacks and a sweatshirt.
customer_reviews.author: jflo

customer_reviews.title: Nice sports bag
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for my 8 yr old son. Easy for him to carry all his equipment.
customer_reviews.author: G$

customer_reviews.title: not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: its not a heavy duty material but i think it should hold up for at least 2 seasons of baseball for my stepson
customer_reviews.author: EJC1013

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This worked awesome for my son and will be great for many years to comeb
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for helmet, gloves and bat. Has plenty of room. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for baseball!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my son for baseball, it has a part to put his drinks, bats, and it has a clip to hang up on the fence during practices so it doesn’t sit on the ground. Very efficient!
customer_reviews.author: TC

customer_reviews.title: Baseball backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my grandson. Keeps his bats and balls all together
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Scheller

customer_reviews.title: Great For T-Ballers!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my t-ball player to keep all his special gear in. He’s so proud to wear it and hang it in the dugout. Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Anna M

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this bag one stars all across the board because after only having this bag for less than a month, the zipper broke! At first the zipper would zip up then open from the other end. I paid a lot for this bag in hopes it would last the rest of my son's baseball season but that was not the case.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great ball bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bags, they hold my boys helmet, gloves, cleats, and bats. Love the fact they can pack all this and carry a water bottle and other supplies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Little Bag
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for what we needed, only complaint is the bat holder was a bit loose.
customer_reviews.author: ARaymond14

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great baseball bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is really well priced for what it is. My 4 year old son uses it for t-ball and should be able to us for several more years. He carries his bat, helmet, glove, and shoes without a problem. The material is very sturdy feeling. We would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce N.

customer_reviews.title: Great for even small children
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for little league baseball, not too big that a child couldn't carry it, but large enough for a mask helmet, 3 gloves, several balls, two bats, and 3 mitts.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Nicole Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Good sized
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of this backpack and the size is great!! The color is nice! There is a mesh type material at the top and I’m worried it may not hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves his bat, helmet, balls, glove, cap, cleats and uniform bag. It all fits in the bag plus more!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a very cheap bag. It is completely fraying apart on both bags we bought. I will be lucky to make it through one season.
customer_reviews.author: DKoss

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of room
customer_reviews.text: Good price and has plenty of room for bat, glove, balls, and helmet!
customer_reviews.author: P. Prince

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Lasted all season and still going strong for use next season.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last the season...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this bag for this baseball season and the zipper did not make it through the season. May be a better fit for kids new to baseball without a lot of equipment and who wouldn’t need to use it daily.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

product_meta.title: Franklin Sports MLB Batpack Bag - Youth Baseball, Softball and Teeball Bag - Equipment Bag For Sports - Bag Holds Bats (2) and Includes Fence Hook
product_meta.description: The Franklin Sports MLB Bat Pack is a durable batpack for transporting all your game or practice equipment in one package. Tough, lightweight nylon is added for durability. The soft backpack-style shoulder straps are designed for comfort and extended carrying time. The outer pockets let you carry up to two bats hands-free; and the zippered front pocket is ideal for keys, ID badges, and other small items.
feature_bullets: LARGE STORAGE COMPARTMENT – Spacious main compartment holds baseball helmet with face mask, batting gloves, fielding glove, cleats, and various accessories
VENTILATION – Top side mesh ventilation allows breathability for airing out cleats and gloves after practice or game
EASY USE FENCE HOOK – Convenient j style hook allows bag to hang on dugout fence for easy accessibility
SUPERIOR PORTABILITY – Contoured, cushioned backpack style shoulder straps provide for easy transport; quick access dual bat storage holds two bats that are easy to grab when on the go
CONVENIENT VALUABLES POCKETS – Top and front access pockets safely store keys, mobile phone, wallet, and small valuables. BAG SIZE 19. 25 inches x 14. 00 inches x 7. 25 inches
